policy_initiatives.description: Germany's comprehensive policy framework to achieve the SDGs.
policy_initiatives.impact: Significant reduction in carbon emissions and increased renewable energy use.

details.progress: Poverty rate reduced by 5% over the past year.
Improved agricultural productivity through sustainable practices.

policy_initiatives.description: Kenya's strategic initiatives focusing on affordable housing, manufacturing, universal healthcare, and food security.
policy_initiatives.impact: Enhanced food security and improved healthcare access.

details.progress: Increased social protection programs for vulnerable populations.
Significant improvements in food security and agricultural resilience.

policy_initiatives.description: A fund aimed at preventing deforestation in the Amazon rainforest.
policy_initiatives.impact: Reduction in deforestation rates and improved conservation efforts.

details.progress: Reduction in greenhouse gas emissions through reforestation projects.
Increased protection of biodiversity in the Amazon.

policy_initiatives.description: An initiative to improve sanitation and waste management.
policy_initiatives.impact: Improved urban cleanliness and sanitation facilities.

details.progress: Increased access to clean drinking water and sanitation facilities.
Enhanced waste management and cleaner public spaces.

policy_initiatives.description: Efforts to restore and protect the Great Barrier Reef.
policy_initiatives.impact: Improved coral health and marine biodiversity.

details.progress: Efforts to reduce coral bleaching and improve reef health.
